sentences.en: He promoted a cult of infallibility around himself and his players.
sentences.cn: 他为自己和他的队员们打造了一层耀眼的光环.

sentences.en: I've finally nailed the myth of his infallibility, ie shown that he can make mistakes.
sentences.cn: 我终于揭穿了他‘一贯正确’的神话(表明他也会犯错误).
谁也不能说自己是一贯正确的.

sentences.en: Since I had succeeded in teaching Doodle to walk, I began to believe infallibility.
sentences.cn: 因为我成功地教会了嘟嘟走路, 我开始有了自信.

sentences.en: The parents realized how much belief their children usually have in their character and infallibility.
sentences.cn: 他们意识到孩子通常多么相信父母的品行和父母的绝对正确.

words.tran_cn: 绝对可靠的；绝无错误的
永远正确的人；绝无谬误的事物
